definition: this/these/(commonly pr. [zhei4] before a classifier, esp. in Beijing)
one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit
disposition of troops/wave/spate/burst/spell/short period of time/classifier for events or states of short duration

son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)

sentences.english: Hopefully we won't need to do another one like that for a while.
sentences.chinese: 但願這一陣子不用再來一次像這樣的。

sentences.english: "Butter is awful dear these days, " he suggested.
sentences.chinese: “這一陣子黃油可是貴得嚇人，”他暗示道。

sentences.english: Her streak of bad luck seems to be bottoming out.
sentences.chinese: 她這一陣子壞運氣似乎到頭了。

sentences.english: This is a time always asking myself, and I for what?
sentences.chinese: 這一陣子老是在問自己，我適合什麼？

sentences.english: These days Tom has been dabbling at painting.
sentences.chinese: 這一陣子湯姆迷上了畫畫。

sentences.english: I believe more and more people today are crying out "money no enough."
sentences.chinese: 這一陣子，大喊“錢不夠用”的人一定越來越多。

sentences.english: I am busy these days, so I haven't been Alec's blog for a long time.
sentences.chinese: 這一陣子好忙，因此有一段時間未上有朋的部落格。

sentences.english: I believe more and more people today are crying out "money not enough."
sentences.chinese: 這一陣子，大喊“錢不夠用”的人一定很多。

sentences.english: These days, you need to be able to ride the breaking wave of constant change.
sentences.chinese: 這一陣子，你需要有能力乘著不斷變動的碎波前進。

sentences.english: Sally's friendship for Susan seems to have been cooling down for sometime.
sentences.chinese: 薩利對蘇珊的友誼這一陣子似乎冷淡下去了。
